mapper.select: SELECT A.MBER_SN , A.MBER_ID , A.MBER_NM , A.SEXDSTN , B.NCNM , B.OCCP_CODE , FN_GET_CODE_NM('OCCP', B.OCCP_CODE) as OCCP_NM , B.EXP , B.LEVEL , B.POINT , D.GUILD_NM , D.GRADE , D.CLA FROM MBER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN AVATAR_INFO B ON A.MBER_SN = B.MBER_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN GUILD_MBER_LIST C ON A.MBER_SN = C.MBER_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN GUILD_INFO D ON C.GUILD_SN = D.GUILD_SN WHERE A.GRADE_CODE = '100' AND A.USE_AT = 'Y'
